channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump lays out his redistricting endgame: A 100-seat Republican majority
item.description: President Trump shared his ultimate voting reform goal in a Wednesday Truth Social post , saying he wants the GOP to pick up 100 congressional seats. ...

item.title: 6 states lead U.S. with most unauthorized immigrants, new Pew study finds
item.description: Data: Pew Research Center and U.S. Census Bureau; Map: Sara Wise/Axios California and Texas are among the six states where the majority of the nation'...

item.title: Trump's next fight: "woke" museum interpretations of history
item.description: A White House official told Axios that President Trump intends to expand his review of American museums for "woke" ideology beyond the Smithsonian Ins...

item.title: Stormclouds abound as economists gather in Jackson Hole
item.description: Top economists gathering in the Rockies this year face seismic questions not just about near-term policy, but about the role of the world's most impor...

item.title: President Trump's massive civil fraud penalty just got tossed out
item.description: A state appellate court in New York threw out President Trump's roughly $465 million fine in his civil fraud case Thursday morning. Why it matters: Th...

item.title: Eric Adams adviser suspended after giving reporter cash in potato chip bag
item.description: Katie Honan, a reporter for the City, said that Winnie Greco, a volunteer for Adams’s reelection campaign, apologized and told her the gesture was cul...

item.title: What’s at stake as Trump’s redistricting push sparks a national map fight
item.description: New congressional maps could determine which party wins control of the House in next year’s elections — but election experts say they could also shape...

item.title: Harris to embark on tour to promote memoir about presidential campaign
item.description: The 15-city book tour will be Harris’s first series of planned public appearances around the country since she lost the election in November.

item.title: California lawmakers pass first bills to counter Texas in nationwide fight over election maps
item.description: California races toward redrawing congressional maps as Texas moves toward final approval of its plans.

item.title: Trump says he will join police, military on D.C. streets Thursday
item.description: The move continues his administration’s efforts to exert control over the capital city.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
